text: @Sojourner4Truth Awww. Thank you Monica! The feeling is so damn mutual!
Correction: white women have got to stop making the criminalizing of Black men the *cost* of Black feminist solidarity.
If forced to choose between supporting black men and supporting white women, I will always choose to support *black women*. That is all.
Black men have got to stop making the the co-signing of patriarchy the cost of Black women's racial solidarity.
White women have got to stop making the criminalizing of Black men the coat of Black feminist solidarity.

While Black women still facing down cops in Ferguson, some of these dudes won't even step up & ride 4 our right to be safe in the streets.
Moreover, I will not spend my time on this issue riding hard abt racism ag brothers when they aint riding hard for Black women's safety.
Re that street harassment video: all the Blacks are not men, and all the women are not white.
@freedomrideblog I denounce the racism of the video. I also denounce the rampant problem of street harassment of wmn no matter who does it.
@freedomrideblog Yeah Chris mentioned the dubious editing of then out. I felt it more important to highlight the erasure of women of color.
